channel.title: Market News on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Market News on TechnoStreet

item.title: Hyderabad, Delhi, Bengaluru Top Choices For NRIs Buying Homes: Survey
item.description: Hyderabad, Delhi, Bengaluru Top Choices For NRIs Buying Homes: Survey The top picks for most NRIs in the survey for the first six months (H1) of 2021 were Bengaluru, Pune and Chennai.

item.title: Oil Producers Likely To Stick To View Of Long-Term Oil Demand Rise
item.description: Oil Producers Likely To Stick To View Of Long-Term Oil Demand Rise OPEC's view that world oil demand will keep rising for longer than many other forecasters predict is not expected to change much in its forthcoming major report, despite the growing role of renewables.

item.title: Rishi Sunak's Wife Earned Rs 126.6 Crore Dividend From Infosys In 2022
item.description: Rishi Sunak’s Wife Earned Rs 126.6 Crore Dividend From Infosys In 2022 Akshata Murty, wife of Britain's incoming Prime Minister Rishi Sunak, earned Rs 126.
